actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide that the laws restricting trade between points in the United States to vessels of the United States shall not apply to inflatable boats used in river running.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1920, to stipulate that laws restricting trade between points in the United States to United States vessels shall not apply to inflatable boats used in river running.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the laws restricting trade between points in the United States to vessels of the United States shall not apply to inflatable boats used in river running.
